actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should establish the discount rate on commercial and industrial paper relating to small businesses at a rate which is less than the discount rate for other types of commercial and industrial paper.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should establish a lower discount rate on commercial and industrial paper relating to small business concerns.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should establish the discount rate on commercial and industrial paper relating to small businesses at a rate which is less than the discount rate for other types of commercial and industrial paper.
